events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position, and our team is excited to review your qualifications and experiences carefully.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department focusing on software and development roles, matching your skills and background.
A recruiter experienced in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the recruiter was impressed with your technical knowledge and communication skills.
You responded promptly and positively to the recruiterâ€™s follow-up questions regarding your experience with devops and software architecture.
Your technical interview is scheduled for June 1st, during which you will discuss software engineering concepts and solve coding challenges with the tech team.
The technical interview went very well. Feedback indicates your skills with software development and devops practices were highly appreciated.
We have scheduled your HR interview for June 5th to discuss cultural fit and other employment details, rounding out the recruitment process.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with positive remarks regarding your interpersonal skills and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to propose a formal job offer based on your strong performance in the technical and HR interviews, with competitive compensation and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback and acceptance intent regarding the job offer, expressing enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer and are now officially part of our engineering team, marking the start of a promising new journey.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions, access setup, and introductions to team members to ensure a smooth transition.
The hiring process is officially closed successfully with your integration into the engineering department, and we look forward to your contributions.
